results.title: Metformin attenuates hyperlipidaemia-associated vascular calcification through anti-ferroptotic effects.
results.text_hl: In addition, supplementation of @<m>DISEASE_Smooth_Muscle_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018235 @@@VSMCs@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ enhances the antioxidative capacity of @<m>DISEASE_Smooth_Muscle_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018235 @@@VSMCs@@@ through @GENE_NFE2L2 @GENE_83619 @@@Nrf2@@@ signalling activation.

results.title: Metformin alleviates beta-glycerophosphate-induced calcification of vascular smooth muscle cells via AMPK/mTOR-activated autophagy
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ could potentially alleviate @GENE_BGLAP @GENE_632 @@@beta-GP@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Smooth_Muscle_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018235 @@@calcification of VSMCs@@@.
